statements: SELECT * FROM TimeSeriesData;
SELECT timestamp, moving_avg FROM TimeSeriesData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE value > 100;
SELECT timestamp, value FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE moving_avg IS NOT NULL;
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_value, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM TimeSeriesData;
SELECT * FROM TimeSeriesData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT timestamp, value FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY value ASC
SELECT * FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE trend_analysis = 'Upward'
SELECT AVG(value) AS avg_value, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT timestamp, moving_avg FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE moving_avg IS NOT NULL ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM moving_averages ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT timestamp, value FROM moving_averages WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_value FROM moving_averages;
SELECT * FROM trend_analysis WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM trend_analysis;
SELECT * FROM moving_averages WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_value FROM trend_analysis WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value FROM moving_averages;
SELECT timestamp, AVG(trend_result) AS average_result FROM trend_analysis GROUP BY timestamp HAVING COUNT(timestamp) > 1 ORDER BY average_result DESC;
SELECT COUNT(timestamp) AS total_timestamps, SUM(value) AS total_value FROM moving_averages;
SELECT * FROM time_series_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT value FROM moving_average WHERE moving_avg > 0.5;
SELECT timestamp, value FROM time_series_data WHERE value < 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend = 'increasing' OR trend = 'decreasing' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_value FROM moving_average;
SELECT * FROM time_series_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT timestamp, value FROM moving_average WHERE moving_avg > 0.5;
SELECT MIN(value) AS min_value, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM time_series_data;
SELECT timestamp, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM moving_average GROUP BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend = 'upward' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM time_series_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT value FROM time_series_data WHERE value > 100;
SELECT timestamp, avg_value FROM moving_avg WHERE avg_value < 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT application_name, data_volume FROM big_data_application WHERE data_volume > 1000000;
SELECT * FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend = 'positive' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM time_series_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT value FROM time_series_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT timestamp, avg_value FROM moving_avg WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY avg_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trend, COUNT(*) AS trend_count FROM trend_analysis GROUP BY trend HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT application_name, SUM(data_volume) AS total_data FROM big_data_application GROUP BY application_name ORDER BY total_data DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM MOVING_AVERAGE WHERE id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, value FROM MOVING_AVERAGE ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, data->>'price' AS price FROM TIME_SERIES_DATA WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM WINDOW_FUNCTION WHERE window_size >= 10 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, timestamp, trend FROM TREND_ANALYSIS WHERE trend = 'Up' OR trend = 'Down';
SELECT * FROM MOVING_AVERAGE
SELECT id, timestamp, trend FROM TREND_ANALYSIS WHERE trend = 'Up' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, timestamp, window_size FROM WINDOW_FUNCTION WHERE window_size > 10 AND timestamp <= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM TIME_SERIES_DATA ORDER BY id LIMIT 5
SELECT id, data FROM BIG_DATA_APPLICATION WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
